A compact assault rifle designed for urban combat and close-quarters engagements, featuring a lightweight polymer frame for enhanced maneuverability. Its modular design includes a full-length Picatinny rail for mounting optics and accessories, allowing for greater adaptability in tactical scenarios. With a balanced combination of firepower and portability, it is well-suited for special forces, law enforcement, and military personnel operating in confined environments.
